text: Chen Yu (, 11 November 1901 – 21 March 1974) was a Chinese politician. He served as the Minister of Fuel Industries, and was the Governor of Guangdong province from 1957 to 1967. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Governors of Guangdong Category:Republic of China people born during Qing Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Guangdong Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Guangdong Category:Politicians from Shenzhen
title: Chen Yu (politician)
